Hi everyone,

Our company has launched a new hosting control panel, ServerPilot, that is great for resource-limited servers.

https://serverpilot.io/

Here's a bit more info about ServerPilot:

  * Pricing
    * free for basic control panel stuff (configuration and security)
    * we charge for advanced features like monitoring
    * [See plans and pricing](https://serverpilot.io/pricing.html).
  * Features
    * configures and installs everything the server needs
    * centralized, SaaS control panel so you don't waste resources on your server
    * configures PHP websites and MySQL databases
    * offers server stats monitoring and application error monitoring
    * automates security updates and sets up a firewall
    * [More features](https://serverpilot.io/features-overview.html).
  * What we don't do
    * Manage email
    * Manage DNS

If you're selling shared hosting, ServerPilot is not yet a replacement for cPanel or Plesk. Our focus is on a secure, lightweight control panel for developers and VPS owners to manage their own websites on their own servers. If you're a developer with your own servers hosting your websites, you'll love us. If you're selling VPSes, ServerPilot is something many of your clients will love.

Please send us questions, feedback, and feature requests.

Thanks!

Justin Samuel  
Founder & CEO, ServerPilot
